meanings.definition: In a pleasant or friendly manner
meanings.sent1: She smiled congenially at her neighbor as they passed by.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together congenially to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat and dog greeted each other congenially, surprising their owners.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone congenially, warming everyone on the picnic blanket.
meanings.sent5: The music played congenially in the background, creating a relaxed atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Suitable or appropriate to a particular person or situation
meanings.sent1: The congenial atmosphere of the cafe made it a favorite spot for locals.
meanings.sent2: She found a congenial group of friends who shared her love for hiking.
meanings.sent3: The congenial dress code for the party was casual and comfortable.
meanings.sent4: His congenial personality made him the perfect host for the event.
meanings.sent5: The congenial colors of the room made it feel welcoming and cozy.
